title: Email Unsubscribed
description: Use to capture details when a person unsubscribes from an email.

xdm:mailingID.title: Mailing ID
xdm:mailingID.description: Unique ID of the email asset.

xdm:mailingName.title: Mailing Name
xdm:mailingName.description: Friendly name of the email asset.

xdm:testVariantID.title: Test Variant ID
xdm:testVariantID.description: Unique ID of the test variant of the email asset.

xdm:testVariantName.title: Test Variant Name
xdm:testVariantName.description: Friendly name of the test variant of the email asset.

xdm:webPageID.title: Web Page ID
xdm:webPageID.description: Unique ID of the web page.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: The normative name of the web page. This name is not necessarily the page title or directly associate with page content, but is used to organize a site's pages for classification purposes.

xdm:queryParameters.title: Query Parameters
xdm:queryParameters.description: Query Parameters used for the web page. This is normally the value of a string after `?` in the url.

xdm:URL.title: URL
xdm:URL.description: URL of referrer to web page.

xdm:environment.title: Environment
xdm:environment.description: The information related to web page and link of the ExperienceEvent.

xdm:ipV4.title: IPv4
xdm:ipV4.description: The numerical label assigned to a device participating in a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication.

xdm:browserDetails.title: Browser details
xdm:browserDetails.description: The browser specific details such as browser name, version, javascript version, user agent string, and accept language.

xdm:userAgent.title: User agent
xdm:userAgent.description: The HTTP user-agent string from the client request.
